main.title: Hi, I'm Carlos Galindo
main.subtitle: I'm a Software Developer
main.description: Software Engineer with full-stack experience building responsive front-end interfaces, scalable back-end systems, and RESTful APIs. Skilled in database design, optimization, cloud deployment, and industrial automation using SCADA, PLCs, and IO-Link.

about.title: About me
about.description: I consider myself a person who is always looking to learn new things, I am a person who likes to work in a team and I am always looking to help others.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some of the projects I have worked on

projects.name: CFE Workers Overtime Manager System
projects.description: Web application to manage and record the overtime of the workers of the CFE (Comisión Federal de Electricidad). The system allows workers to register their overtime hours, which are then sent to their respective supervisors for review and approval. Project developed during my internship at CFE.

projects.name: Balluff Warehouse Orders Management System
projects.description: Desktop application for managing production line orders sent to the warehouse. The system records and maintains a history of all orders, enabling better traceability and inventory planning. It communicates with an industrial scale via a serial RS-232 connection to ensure accurate weight measurements and order control.

projects.name: Balluff Maintenance System
projects.description: Web application for managing and scheduling maintenance tasks for machines on the production line. The system allows users to assign maintenance tasks, set deadlines, and track the status of each task to ensure optimal operation of the production line.

projects.name: Astro Eye
projects.description: Web application that allows users to explore and learn about NASA's astronomical images. Users can visualize HD images, read detailed descriptions, and access additional information about each image. The application provides an engaging way to discover the wonders of the universe through NASA's vast collection of images. project developed as part of the Nasa Space Apps Challenge 2025 hackathon.

projects.name: Cloud Music Streaming Platform
projects.description: Full-stack Spotify-like music player with scalable streaming architecture. Built with Angular and NestJS, using PostgreSQL for relational data, CassandraDB for high-volume playback logs, and Google Cloud Storage for media delivery. Features authentication, playlists, search, real-time playback state, and responsive UI.
projects.alt: Music streaming platform dashboard and player UI

projects.name: Yo Voy Ags App
projects.description: Mobile application for the management of public transport in Aguascalientes. It allows users to locate routes, stops, recharge their transport cards, and provide feedback on the service. Developed for the Hackathon Mobility 2025 by Coordinación General de Movilidad de Aguascalientes and Instituto de Educación de Aguascalientes (IEA).

projects.name: QuickView
projects.description: System for previewing DICOM images and sending results to patients by WhatsApp. It allows medical professionals to upload DICOM images, generate reports, and send them directly to patients via WhatsApp for quick and easy access. System developed for the Hackathon by Genius Arena and Salud Digna (Hackaton Talent Lant 2025).

projects.name: Atenea
projects.description: Uncentralized system for the management, follow-up and analysis of police reports. It allows citizens to file reports securely and anonymously, while enabling authorities to efficiently track and analyze incidents. Developed for the Cybersecurity Hackathon by Fundación Dedica, ICP Hub Latam and Seguridad Pública de Aguascalientes.

projects.name: Talent Quest
projects.description: Platform of courses and certifications for the development of skills and competencies. It allows users to access a wide variety of courses and certifications to improve their skills and competencies in different areas. Project developed for the Hackatón GDN-e 2025 by NTT Data.

projects.name: UTMA Library Management System
projects.description: Web application to manage the library of the UTMA (Universidad Tecnológica Metropolitana de Aguascalientes). The system allows users to search for books, borrow and return them, as well as manage the inventory of the library.

projects.name: Microservices with Docker
projects.description: CRUD application with microservices architecture using Docker, Nodejs and express as backend, Next as frontend and PostgreSQL as database.

workExperience.description: As an intern, I developed a worker management system for the Comisión Federal de Electricidad (CFE), based on a hierarchical role model: Capturist, Office Manager, Department Manager, and Superintendent. The system allowed users to register activities, which were automatically forwarded to the corresponding supervisor for review and validation, ensuring an efficient and controlled workflow.

As an intern, I participated in various tasks, including maintaining and extending the functionality of Balluff’s system, which monitors the PLCs on the production line (using Ignition Designer); optimizing and maintaining databases with historical records from the line's sensors; and developing a system to manage production line orders sent to the warehouse, using an industrial scale as a control mechanism.
